can meet tight deadlines under pressure

key_responsibilities: Track bills and maintain bill files

proficient in Microsoft Office Suite, Adobe Acrobat, and internet research using legislative resources

key_responsibilities: acts as a liaison to federal, district, and local agencies
building and maintaining relationships with communities of color
Working closely with the District Office and Washington, DC staff

capacity to work both independently and as part of a team
strong written and oral communications skills

key_responsibilities: Advise the Staff Director and Chief Counsel on legal issues

Strong oral and written communication skills
Strong legal judgment and demonstrated professional integrity
Experience auditing large sets of data
Ability to work independently or as part of an investigative team
Ability to pass Security Background Investigation to obtain Top Secret clearance
Graduation from an ABA accredited law school and active bar membership

key_responsibilities: managing members of the legislative team
Writing and developing a range of high-quality written materials

key_responsibilities: provide legal advice and counsel on a range of matters

several years of legal experience in the federal government
background in fiscal law and legislative drafting

key_responsibilities: responding to constituent requests for information
